name: Massive Cleavage vs Zombies: Awesome Edition
description: Your mission is to find BBQ sauce for your people and bring it back to them. Fighting off thousands of zombies with only your massive cleaver and equally massive cleavage.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Atom Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: integrated Storage: 1024 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Any dedicated graphics card will do Storage: 1024 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The bad kind of trash. It might be intentionally bad, but it misses the point entirely. Go and play Zombie Apocalypse on the Amiga instead.
